data.name: Samurai Shampoo: Support the developers!
data.detailed_description: Buying this DLC will support the development of Samurai Shampoo. Doesn't change the game itself. Will grant you the "Samurai Shampoo Donator" role in Discord (Message Joey with a screenshot with proof that you've bought the DLC!).
data.about_the_game: Buying this DLC will support the development of Samurai Shampoo. Doesn't change the game itself. Will grant you the "Samurai Shampoo Donator" role in Discord (Message Joey with a screenshot with proof that you've bought the DLC!).
data.short_description: Buying this DLC will support the development of Samurai Shampoo. Doesn't change the game itself. Will grant the "Samurai Shampoo Donator" discord role.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Probably windows 7 and up
  • Processor: Something that your toaster will run
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: One of the newer integrated GPUs is fine. mega F for the GPU shortage of 2021
  • Storage: 100 MB available space

package_groups.name: default
package_groups.title: Buy Samurai Shampoo: Support the developers!
